Title: Two Piece Mermaid Prom Dress

----

Sku: CR750

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 6, 8, 4, 10

Colors: peach

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CR750-peach-two-piece-mermaid-prom-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Halter top bodice with studded bead work that creates floral patterns and covers the entire bodice. Intricate designs curve around the neckline front and back. The trim of the form fitting skirt is also beaded at the midriff. The skirt flares into a mermaid silhouette.
